name: Transact
body:
# This is the iPhone App source code 

It's written using [Titanium Studio](http://www.appcelerator.com/products/titanium-studio/)

The purpose of the Transact App is to record monetary transactions. 

There are 3 tabs:

1. Transact: For entering transactions
2. History: Shows transaction history ordered by date
3. Settings

This project goes along with its server side counterpart: [DateABank](http://dogeared.github.com/DateABank).

You can read more about the project at my blog, [afitnerd](http://afitnerd.com/2012/03/19/code-small-ftw-monday/).

![DateABAnk](http://afitnerd.com/wp-content/uploads/2012/04/DateABankScreenshot.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
